about_the_game:
The artistic map of Aeterna Noctis shows the entire world of the game in maximum quality. The Wasteland of the Fallen, the Ascension Cave, the Infinite Sea... This is the game map brought to life.

The map is an artistic representation of the world of Aeterna and the path that the King of Darkness has followed in his quest to reclaim the throne. All the game areas are represented in great detail. Get the atlas of Aeterna!
detailed_description:
The artistic map of Aeterna Noctis shows the entire world of the game in maximum quality. The Wasteland of the Fallen, the Ascension Cave, the Infinite Sea... This is the game map brought to life.

The map is an artistic representation of the world of Aeterna and the path that the King of Darkness has followed in his quest to reclaim the throne. All the game areas are represented in great detail. Get the atlas of Aeterna!

name: Aeterna Noctis: Artistic Map

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4460 | AMD Athlon X4
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 | AMD R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-9600 | AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 | AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: The artistic map of Aeterna Noctis shows the entire world of the game in maximum quality.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil
